entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-10-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor WebAssembly navigation behaves differently after publish #44368
  • .NET 7 RC1 "dotnet new grpc" creates a project that references a package which is not compatible with .NET 7 #44367
  • Perf improvement: plaintext #44366
  • Blazor: NavigationManager RegisterLocationChangingHandler and LocationChanged never are invoked #44365
  • `services.AddDefaultIdentity(configureIdentityOptions, configureAuthenticationOptions)` #44364
  • [Blazor] Virtualization does not work with web components #44357
    Backlog
  • AuthenticationSchemeOptions delegates don't have an async compatible alternative #44355

Closed

  • [Blazor WASM] Synchronous events #28250
    Backlog
  • Need to add documentation for `DynamicRouteValueTransformer` #23599
    Backlog
  • Allow showing invalid input values on data bound properties #15195
    Backlog
  • [Blazor] Consider using tracing APIs to perform more fine grained logging #14034
    Backlog
  • HashRoute Support Request #18123
    Backlog
  • razorclasslib template project support for F# #18067
    Backlog
  • Enable ASP.NET Core on Apple Silicon #26821
    Backlog
  • Using SSR (Angular) in .NET 6 #39295
    Discussions
  • Blazor - Title attribute in SVG is picked up by HeadOutlet #44231
    7.0.0
  • F# tests might not verify compilability #7638
    Backlog
  • F# MVC Does not even support authentication out of the box. #11905
    Backlog
  • [NetSDKE2E][Loc]With VS 17.4 preview 3 + NET7 RC2 installed on Local OS, the template "ASP.NET Core with React.js and Redux" is inconsistent with EN's template in dotnet new --list. #44104
  • View in Area missing imports from Views/Shared/_ViewImports.cshtml #44356
  • Empty Blazor WebAssembly template should have a <title> in index.html #44335
    7.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Verify no two or more pages are using the same @page path #44266
  • does Blazor support Multi Page Applications (MPA)? #44338
  • Blazor @page directive remove requirement for string double quotes (RZ1016) #44352
  • HTTP/3: Enable in Kestrel by default #36486
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve documentation of ConnectionInfo.RemoteIpAddress #44370
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #44369
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/3.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Svc pool #44348
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [release/2.1] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #44347
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x

Merged

  • [release/6.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images and Svc pool #44349
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • [6.0] Allow zero byte reads on the test server response body #44020
    Servicing-approved, area-runtime, 6.0.11
  • [release/2.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44158
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 2.1.x
  • [release/3.1] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44159
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.31
  • [release/6.0] Remove Kevin from CodeOwners #44160
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Use Ubuntu 20.04 a bit more #44172
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Add support for minimal APIs in ApiDescription.Server #44227
    Servicing-approved, area-commandlinetools, 6.0.11
  • [release/3.1] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9080381` to `93f08be` #44302
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.31
  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9080381` to `93f08be` #44303
    blocked, area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.11
  • [release/6.0] Backport 'Make title prerendering not interfere with svg titles' #44343
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.11
  • Update branding to 6.0.11 #44359
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 6.0.x
  • Update branding to 3.1.31 #44358
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 3.1.x
  • [main] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #44351
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview1
  • [release/7.0] Switch to consolidated Windows build images #44350
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode
  • Update StatusCodes.cs #44354
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Route tooling: Add Minimal API or MVC parameter fixer #44276
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview1
  • Turn HTTP/3 on by default in Kestrel #44217
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1

Updated

  • Update documentation for default CookieBuilder options #44290
    Docs, area-security
  • Update static file docs and log if WebRootPath is not found #44296
    area-runtime
  • Generate VS.Redist package for ANCM #39140
    area-infrastructure
  • Optimize some string.Substring usages #44313
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add Azure README, update slnf #44294
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • fix dotnet#43523 HttpSys Content-Length and Transfer-Encoding conflicts #44144
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44309
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:
  • [AuthZ] Add IRequirementData #44342
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2011272 #43956
    blocked, area-infrastructure
  • Better logs in AuthorizationMiddleware #43862
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Route tooling: Add framework route parameter completion #42910
    area-infrastructure, area-web-frameworks
  • Remove 'max-age' in 'Cache-Control' Response Header when Location is None ('no-cache'). #42706
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add code cleanup rules (+perf) #44269
  • Ability to use user-selected or system culture in RequestLocalizationOptions #44282
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Add schema in launchSettings.json files #44295
    area-mvc
  • Add warning on FallbackHref property #44307
    area-mvc, community-contribution
